title: Red onion, sour cherry and pomegranate relish
time: Hands-on time 10 min, plus at least 4 hours pickling
description: A super-simple vegan relish which is bursting with punchy flavours, this is the perfect side dish to add interest to any spread.
ingredients: ½ tsp freshly ground pink or regular peppercorns

method.Step 1: Put 3 tbsp caster sugar, 2 tbsp pomegranate molasses, 150ml red wine vinegar, 75ml pomegranate juice and 1 tsp salt in a pan over a medium-high heat and stir until the sugar is dissolved.

method.Step 2: Put 2 sliced red onions and 170g frozen mixed berries and cherries in a heatproof bowl or large Kilner jar. Add 1 tsp coriander seeds and ½ tsp freshly ground pink or regular peppercorns.

method.Step 3: Pour over the hot pickling liquid, then set aside for a few hours (or longer; see Make Ahead). Serve the relish in a bowl with cured meats, pâté or the cheeseboard.
